context: Teladoc saw massive growth during pandemic as telehealth became essential. The company acquired Livongo for $18.5B to expand into chronic care management and digital health.

competitors.name: Amwell (American Well)
competitors.notes: Telehealth platform competing for health system partnerships

competitors.name: MDLive
competitors.notes: Virtual care provider later acquired by Cigna

competitors.name: Doctor on Demand
competitors.notes: Telehealth provider merged with Grand Rounds

competitors.name: Health system telehealth
competitors.notes: Epic MyChart, health systems building own capabilities

competitors.name: Ro
competitors.notes: Digital health company for telehealth and pharmacy
